sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-card class="box-card">
    <el-breadcrumb separator="/" class="bread">
      <el-breadcrumb-item v-for="item of NameList" :key="item.meta.title">
        {{ item.meta.title }}
      </el-breadcrumb-item>
    </el-breadcrumb>
	<slot name="goback" ></slot>
  </el-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "breadCrumb",
  mounted() {
	console.log(this.$route.matched);
  },
  computed: {
    NameList() {
      return this.$route.matched;
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.box-card {
  background-color: #fff;
  padding: 0px;
  margin: 0px;
  overflow: auto;
height:60px;


}
.bread{
	float:left;
	padding:0px
}
</style>
